holidays.title: World Listening Day
holidays.description: Shhh… do you hear that? It’s the sound of World Listening Day!

holidays.title: Birthday of Don Luis Munoz Rivera
holidays.description: Read about this key player’s struggle for political independence in Spain-controlled Puerto Rico.

holidays.title: Insurance Nerd Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the day to appreciate those who love working in the insurance industry.

holidays.title: National Caviar Day
holidays.description: “Oh, what a delicacy!” or “Ew! Fish eggs?”

holidays.title: National Dapper Your Data Day
holidays.description: Get ready to completely clean your digital footprint during this special celebration.

holidays.title: National Sour Candy Day
holidays.description: Our taste buds are already tingling in anticipation of (s)our awesome ideas!

holidays.title: Perfect Family Day
holidays.description: Don’t have the perfect family? Yours still could be, because a perfect family can be built.

holidays.title: Uruguay Constitution Day
holidays.description: Join the Uruguayans as they celebrate Jura de la Constitución de la Repblica Oriental del Uruguay.

holidays.title: Canelo Álvarez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Through various victories, Alvarez proved himself as one of the greatest boxers.

holidays.title: Chayce Beckham’s Birthday
holidays.description: This singer-songwriter rose to fame after winning season 19 of “American Idol.”

holidays.title: Nelson Mandela’s Birthday
holidays.description: This political leader can rest in peace knowing that he revolutionized the political scene in South Africa.

holidays.title: Taemin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Since his debut with SHINEE in 2008, he’s enjoyed fame and success in the K-pop industry.

holidays.title: Vin Diesel’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor has a need for speed, and there’s no stopping him.
